title: Wednesdays [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Jeremy Stanford
brief_description: Shelly (Josephine Byrnes) awakens one Wednesday morning and slowly descends down the stairs in her pajamas. As the morning progresses the viewer learns of love found, lost, jealousy, suspicion and a murder as she retraces the steps of how she discovered her partner, John’s (Greg Stone) infidelity - or does she?
